Author: Jeanne1C13
Text: Thank you!!! I think I'll pick up some potassium pills and midol tomorrow! Hopefully they can make at least a little difference over 4 days.

Author: SubBiscuit
Text: Electrolytes help me debloat, and I take a probiotic pill that has helped immensely. I don't know if either would help in a short time but it's worth a try!
